urls.title: Trump rallies his base to treat coronavirus as a ‘hoax’
urls.description: At a South Carolina rally on the eve of the Democratic primary, the president also sought to manage expectations about the White House’s response to the outbreak.

domain.name: Person

entity.name: President Trump puts VP Pence in charge of US response to coronavirus
entity.description: Donald Trump said the risk to the US from the deadly coronavirus “remains very low” and that he has put Vice President Mike Pence in charge of the American response to the outbreak.

text:
ICYMI: Trump urged his supporters at a rally tonight in South Carolina to treat the coronavirus like a "hoax."

By the time he'd landed back in D.C., health officials had announced a new case in the U.S. -- this time, in Oregon:
https://t.co/SYseKhHaqy
